name: Elin Voss
personality: Gruff, pragmatic, maternal when no one's watching. Collects revenge fantasies like others collect medals.
background: Former elite racer who burned out the year AI coaching hit mainstream. Now lives off-grid in a retrofitted shipping container with three ex-wifi routers and one emotionally stunted cat. Licenses expired, dignity intact.
physical_description: Lean, wiry, crow’s feet like cracked handlebars. Wears old Svenska Energi jackets patched with conductive thread and smug defiance.
dialogue_style: Commands disguised as questions. Doesn’t waste words. Occasionally drops brutal deadpan jokes.

relationships.Saga Lundqvist: Treats like a daughter she never agreed to have.
relationships.Freja Holm: Still thinks she could’ve gone pro if Elin had started coaching earlier.

static_attributes.augmentation_level: Minimal – retinal overlay, black-market VPN mod

rage_trigger: People who warm up on electric-assist
